nodes.text: The Argovia Strike is a mini three-part roleplaying game adventure that appears in Instant Adventures, published by West End Games.
As the Empire blockades the Endocray sector, the Rebel Alliance must send agents to disable the sensor nets so their supply ships can reach their outposts.
The agents arrive on Argovia and meet with Battz for their ID cards.
Once inside the complex, they must disable it.
